msbt.message: Yaaay, it's !
Deeeeeear !!!
Hi! How are you? I am GOOD!
Hey, !
How are you, ?
I read your letter! Then I read it to the bugs in the wall!
Your letter surprised me! I opened my mailbox and it fell out. Yikes!
I read your letter to the bugs in the floor, then the bugs in the wall!
I laminated your letter because I never want to get stains on it!
Umm, I accidentally took a bite of your letter. It tasted good!
Why'd your note smell like cookies? Were you baking cookies? Do you have cookies? Can I have one?
I wanna write you a good letter but I'm having a hard time thinking about what to write.
I went outside last night and yelled "CAN ANYONE HEAR ME?" And a lot of angry people said they could.
I don't know if I have enough opinions about stuff! What's your opinion on opinions?
I was eatin' snacks and started to think about how if there's aliens out there, we're THEIR aliens...
Let's have snack time real soon!
We should hang out soon!
I'm gonna go eat stuff now!
I gotta go to the bathroom!
I'm gonna snack so hard right now!
Bye! From
That's all! From
Bye-bye! From
I'm and I'm hungry!
OK, bye now. From !
